extracted_playbook.title: Identify Git Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check the installed Git version to determine if it is prior to 2.45.1.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the Git version prior to 2.45.1?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade Git to Version 2.45.1 or Later
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade Git to the latest version (at least 2.45.1) to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Exercise Caution When Cloning Repositories
extracted_playbook.description: If upgrading is not possible, exercise caution when cloning repositories, especially from untrusted sources, to mitigate potential risks.

affected_products: Git installations prior to version 2.45.1 on Windows, macOS, Linux, and BSD
